report.title: Much More Than a Sleep Aid
report.author: Akdov
report.bodytext: I have noticed (well, they're hard to miss) very unique experiences while on Ambien. I have even experimented with it, such as taking only 5mg or 50mg, and studying the effects on myself. /n /n The following are the observations I wrote down while on 40mg of Ambien: /n /n 12:00am /n Took 40mg Ambien. /n /n 12:30am /n Disconnected feeling. /n Foggy thoughts. /n Hallucinations begin, very acidic [referring to LSD]. /n Mind gains ability to make inanimate objects, animate. /n Interaction with these animates in very weird ways, including conversation with and without spoken words. /n Unlike lsd, very little control over the experience. /n Entrance into whole different created world. /n Barely able to communicate these thoughts with others in 'outside world'. /n Music has its way with thoughts, especially trance and darkstep [these are types of electronica for those who dont know]. /n Music molds thoughts and mind into new 'Mental Worlds'. /n /n 1:30am /n Come back down into real world temporarily. /n sleepy, fatigued, but very awake. /n /n 2:00am /n wandering around in a concious trance-like state. /n /n ~2:00am - ~3:00am /n Memory Gap. [I recall realizing that I recalled nothing of that hour... sleep?] /n /n 3:00am /n decided to go to sleep. /n /n --- /n /n I have noticed an increasing tolerance to ambien, for now just to use it as a sleep aid alone, I must take 20mg (normal dosage is only 10mg). /n I suggest that if one decides to use Ambien recreationally (just something to get fucked up on) do not use it often. Tolerance builds up quicker than anything I have yet encountered, including ecstasy (MDMA) and LSD.
